Xindi Gong, PhD Student

Oden Institute for Computational Engineering and Sciences
The University of Texas at Austin
Student Page

I obtained my Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics and Statistics from Emory University in 2022.

I am now a PhD student at the Oden Institute for Computational Engineering and Sciences of The University of Texas at Austin supervised by Prof. Omar Ghattas. My current research interests include inverse problems and uncertainty quantification. I am also very interested in surrogate models for complex systems.
